item.title: DISH
item.description: score:92 Chances: DISH Media’s partnership with BrightLine to introduce interactive ad units on SLING TV is a positive move in leveraging advanced advertising products for better engagement and revenue generation. The approval of the merger between Dish Network and EchoStar by the FCC is a significant development that will ease debt worries and allow the company to tackle competition from larger U.
